com.dukascopy.api

Interface IAccount


  • public interface IAccount
    Methods of this interface allows to retrieve account information such as current equity

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IAccount.AccountState
      Account state: OK, MARGIN_CLOSING, MARGIN_CALL, OK_NO_MARGIN_CALL, DISABLED, BLOCKED.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrency

        java.util.Currency getCurrency()
        Returns account currency
        Returns:
        account currency

      • getEquity

        double getEquity()
        Returns current equity. Value returned by this function is for information purposes and can be incorrect right after order changes, as it is updated about every 5 seconds
        Returns:
        equity

      • getBaseEquity

        double getBaseEquity()
        Returns current base equity (No open Profit/Loss).
        Value returned by this function is for information purposes and can be incorrect right after order changes, as it is updated about every 5 seconds.
        Returns:
        base equity - equity without open positions' profit/loss

      • getBalance

        double getBalance()
        Returns account balance. The last account balance available is the balance for the previous end-of-day processing.
        Returns:
        balance

      • getLeverage

        double getLeverage()
        Returns current leverage. This is fixed value that is set when you sign contract with Dukascopy. Usually has value of 100
        Returns:
        leverage

      • getUseOfLeverage

        double getUseOfLeverage()
        Returns current use of leverage. Value returned by this function is for information purposes and can be incorrect right after order changes, as it is updated about every 5 seconds
        Returns:
        leverage

      • getCreditLine

        double getCreditLine()
        Returns current available credit. Value returned by this function is for information purposes and can be incorrect right after order changes, as it is updated about every 5 seconds
        Returns:
        available credit

      • getMarginCutLevel

        int getMarginCutLevel()
        Returns maximum use of leverage exceeding which will result in margin cut
        Returns:
        maximum use of leverage before margin cuts

      • getOverWeekEndLeverage

        int getOverWeekEndLeverage()
        Returns maximum use of leverage exceeding which will result in margin cut. Value effective before weekends
        Returns:
        maximum use of leverage before margin cuts at weekends

      • isGlobal

        boolean isGlobal()
        Returns true if account is global account
        Returns:
        true if account is global account

      • getAccountId

        java.lang.String getAccountId()
        Returns account id
        Returns:
        account id

      • getClientIds

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getClientIds()
        Returns client ids for manager account
        Returns:
        set of client ids

      • getAccountState

        IAccount.AccountState getAccountState()
        Returns account state
        Returns:
        account state

      • getStopLossLevel

        double getStopLossLevel()
        Returns account's equity stop loss level. The equity stop loss level is in the account base currency and define an absolute level of equity from or under which the account will be stopped and their exposures closed.
        Returns:
        account equity stop loss level

      • getClients

        java.util.Set<IClientInfo> getClients()
        Get trader Clients set.
        Returns:
        a set of current account's clients

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns true if account is connected to server
        Returns:
        true if account is connected to server, false - otherwise

      • getUserName

        java.lang.String getUserName()
        Returns user name
        Returns:
        user name
